H0.text: Who was married to Guinevere. King Arthur

H1.text: Who was married to Guinevere. Sir Lancelot

H2.text: Who was married to Guinevere. Sir Gawain

H3.text: Who was married to Guinevere. Arthuriad

A5.text: Lancelot and his adulterous relationship with Arthur's queen Guinevere

A6.text: Guinevere was, according to Arthurian legend, an early-medieval queen of Great Britain and the wife of King Arthur.

A7.text: Guinevere meets Lancelot one last time, refusing to kiss him, then returns to the convent.
